title: Update Rental Listing Price
description: A rental unit has been on the market for 30 days with little interest. The property manager decides to reduce the price.

tasks.description: Analyze the listing's performance metrics (views, inquiries) and the current market comps.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the listing is priced too high compared to the market.

tasks.description: Advise the property owner on a recommended price reduction.
tasks.expected_outcome: The owner approves the new, lower price.

tasks.description: Update the price on the rental listing across all syndicated platforms.
tasks.expected_outcome: The listing price is updated online.
